thread.title: Tactical Strategies (TS) Announces Expansion of Population Health Services
thread.title_full: Tactical Strategies (TS) Announces Expansion of Population Health Services

author: admin
title: Tactical Strategies (TS) Announces Expansion of Population Health Services
text:
Tactical Strategies, LLC 
ANN ARBOR, Mich., Sept. 3, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Tactical Strategies (TS), a niche provider that focuses on IT system strategies for businesses within healthcare , today announced that it will continue to expand its consulting and implementation services to support population health initiatives that is growing in demand. The company has focused mostly on working with clients to develop IT strategies that include critical technologies to aggregate information, share data and services such as EMPI, ESB and CDR technologies. They will expand capabilities and services to include clinical analytics, risk management and measures for value-based care to support the shift to population health. 
"We are currently engaged and have been for the last year working with a large health system that has 16 hospitals located throughout California and Texas. We have worked alongside our client to provide technical leadership throughout the selection and pilot process as they developed a strategy for clinical analytics that works for them. The providers and leadership of our client is excited at what these new capabilities will help them accomplish both clinically and operationally. We were able to help them successfully implement a clinical analytics engine that combined data from multiple source systems from their EMR, Claims and Financial systems and then translate that into meaningful information that helps to improve patient outcomes and understand the cost of care," said Rhonda Wille, CEO of TS. Wille went on to explain that the "transition to accountable care and population health requires complex care coordination, physician and patient engagement. Establishing a framework of systems and services for the providers is critical to successfully making population health a reality." 
About Tactical Strategies 
Tactical Strategies helps clients within the healthcare industry improve performance, transform the enterprise, reduce costs and leverage technology. Leveraging cloud technologies, big data solutions, and enterprise architecture we are able to enable clients to process and review large amounts of complex data, address regulatory changes, recover from distress and stimulate growth. Our consultants have extensive experience working within healthcare as CIO's, CTO's, architects and project managers. They employ their expertise in IT and clinical operations to identify Health IT strategies that align to organizations financial, quality and regulatory business needs. The Company provides consulting services to health systems, specialty pharmacy, pharmaceuticals and life sciences organizations across the country. Learn more at www.strategy.healthcare or www.tacstrats.com . 
Source: Tactical Strategies, LLC
